2.0.0.name: wordpress/photocrank
2.0.0.description:
Makes your photos Crankable using the PhotoCrank platform.

Popular Blogs that use this product:

  • The Secret Diary of Steve Jobs
  • Crummy Church Signs
  • Total Diatribe

Still got questions? Visit PhotoCrank FAQ for more information.

Crank your photos up a notch by adding the PhotoCrank Engine to your blog. With the PhotoCrank Engine you can instantly transform any photo or image into a very entertaining and engaging way for your visitors to interact with not only your site, but your other site visitors as well. They can do this by adding captions, images and text directly on top of
